com.mobius.vdrapi.callbacks
Interface IHoldPageList

public interface IHoldPageList

A class implements IHoldPageList to indicate that it can hold an IPageList object. This interface allows the implementor class to manage the storage and retrieval of a IPageList. A class usually implements IHoldPageList in conjunction with another class that would create and add to a page list. A page list is a list of PageListData. PageListData is a class that contains header information about a page. In addition the implementor of the IHoldPageList class allows classes that either have a "has a" or "is a" realtionships to the implementor class to have access to the page list by calling the getPageList method defined by the interface. See INeedObjectWithPageList object for more information. An implementor of this class can optionally turn itself on to store and retrieve a page list. To do so call setObjectWithPageList. Typically the code below is implemented: theCommand.setObjectWithPageList(this); // turn on the page list collection // write some form of the two methods below: IPageList pageList=null; public void setPageList(IPageList given_pageList) { pageList=given_pageList; } // setPageList public IPageList getPageList() { return pageList; } // getPageList Example actual usage: DocumentViewer is an example of a class that implements IHoldPageList. CreatePageGroupCommand implements the interface INeedObjectWithPageList. This allows DocumentViewer to store and retrieve the list of pages downloaded by the CreatePageGroupCommand. To turn the page list interface on DocumentViewer calls setObjectWithPageList. CreatePageGroupCommand checks to see if page list was requested by the caller in this case it was requested by DocumentViewer. Since the page list was requested, CreatePageGroupCommand initializes the page list and passes it back to DocumentViewer by calling setPageList method of DocumentViewer. In addition CreatePageGroupCommand populates the page list as it downloads pages inside the execute method. PrinterControl is an example of a class that uses the "has a" realtionship with DocumentViewer. To obtain the list of pages downloaded by the CreatePageGroupCommand, PrinterControl calls DocumentViewer's getPageList method. Once the PrinterControl has a copy of the page list, PrinterControl can use getFirst and/or getNext to examine the list of pages downloaded.

See Also:
INeedObjectWithPageList

Method Summary
 IPageList getPageList()
          Returns the page list that this object is holding.
 void setPageList(IPageList pageList)
          Sets the page list that this object is holding.
 

Method Detail

getPageList

public IPageList getPageList()
Returns the page list that this object is holding.

Returns:
the page list, null if an error has occurred.

setPageList

Sets the page list that this object is holding.

Parameters:
pageList - the PageList to hold
